website_summaries.verdict: A high-end set of catcher's gear that's just as tough as it looks.
pros: Includes helmet, chest protector, shin guards and bag
With its quality and adjustability, it should last several seasons
cons: Does not include chin or throat guard

customer_reviews.title: 2 of the 3 pieces are right size for big 9/10 yr old
customer_reviews.text: The cheat protector and the helmet were perfect for my son who just turned 10... he is tall for his age and average build but the shin guards were just too tiny... we ended up going with the Easton M7 for the shin guards as the Easton m7 chest protector was too small.. he liked this helmet over the Easton Mako youth as well so ultimately ended up ordering the samurai mask and chest protector and the Easton m7 shin guards in order to have a set that fit him best. Again he is tall for his age... samurai stuff is good quality
customer_reviews.author: Ibburnk18cnu

customer_reviews.title: Sweet looking set
customer_reviews.text: Solid catcher set. My nephew wears this and he's a smaller 8 year old. It's not worth the cost. Straps loosen on their own. But he does look damn good. I would buy it, even again at this price because it looks really good and gives the player some extra confidence. Just would expect the straps to hold. But honestly in 2019 I'm surprised someone hasn't developed an easier, more efficient strapping system. Still old school hook style. IDK, I really like it but there are some sweet looking sets that cost a little less.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Lease

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her set!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great catchers set! Bought it for daughter which plays on a 10U softball team and she loves it! nothing but compliments from her teammates and her coach. She has told me how comfortable it feels on her and I can see how confident she is behind the plate. My daughter is one of the tallest girls on her team and I can see her wearing the set for a least another season and a half (fall ball).
customer_reviews.author: J. Penate

customer_reviews.title: ... year old daughter about 49” tall 47 pounds obviously pretty big on her
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old daughter about 49” tall 47 pounds obviously pretty big on her. The helmet was huge but she has a tiny head and they don’t make anything much smaller. Chest protector was maxed at its smallest, was a little poofy when she squated but not horrible. Leg guards were maxed at smallest but I tied the excess. I think it’s the best gear for her, very protective. Helmet is very heavy though. She isn’t a picture taker but here’s one from the back. She got on her knee a lot but I think that was just leg exhaustion.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this set is amazing. The extra padding on the knees, grip strips on the inside shin guards, the extra coverage on the chest protector. Very very nice set. My only disappointment, it was too big for my 8 year old. Hey Mizuno make a junior youth size!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: High end protection at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Being made by Mizuno, it's obviously high quality gear. It's a heck of a deal when found at sale pricing. And while it's not a super heavy duty bag, the fact that a bag is included does sweeten the deal. As for protection, it's great. My daughter commented that the helmet has a lot of padding. The chest protector is adaptable with Velcro shoulder and crotch pads. I have no complaints at all and am confident she is protected while catching.
customer_reviews.author: estrom

customer_reviews.title: Great set for my 11 year old !
customer_reviews.text: Set ordered for my 11 year old Son who is 5’ tall and @ 80lbs. The set fits very well when adjusted correctly and is very high quality. My Son loves it and says the chest protector is like armor ! The helmet fits well after getting the straps set just right and it is nice that the chin pad is adjustable as well. Great set for the money !
customer_reviews.author: Craigc20

customer_reviews.title: Great, safe set.
customer_reviews.text: This catchers equipment is awesome! Yeah it looks great but the most important thing is that you can tell it is super safe for my 9 year old. Just watched a kid take one off the face mask while using a generic, cheap set and walked right off the field with a concussion. Won’t happen with this set. It’s solid. I’ll be buying another set for my 13 year old soon. I have 3 boys that catch. They’ll all have Mizuno.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Son Loves this set
customer_reviews.text: 10 years old playing travel ball and loves this gear. Then helmet is very comfortable and I only had to make 1 adjustment to add a D ring to the chest plate to make it faster to take on and off. He has plenty of room to grow into and the rib protection was tested during his first game saving him from a bad foul ball to the side.
customer_reviews.author: M Moran

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 11yr old.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 11 yr old. He was tired of use other kids sweet workout equipment. The over the knee protection on the leg guards was a must. All the kid want to borrow my child’s Mizuno gear. My child can be a little picky and the only thing he has noticed is after a couple months of use the foam in the helmet is showing wear. Good gear at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: was easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My son said he loves it, was easy to use. No break in needed. He also said he like how you can easily adjust the pads and straps. Be aware. They advertise it comes with a bag. It has one bag for the helmet and one little bag for the leg guard and chest protector. Not how I imagined. One bag to "hold it all". No matter he already has a bag on wheels. My biggest gripe is with Amazon. The order sat for 5 working days before it was even shipped. And then another 5 days to get to us. Horrible!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald E. Harris Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality with minor design issue
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Although it’s expensive than many other brands, it’s totally worth it. Helmet very comfy for someone with glasses. The ridge at the back of the helmet causes discomfort when the catcher tries to lift their head for pop fly’s. Otherwise it’s a 5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Anil Y

customer_reviews.title: Good Youth Catcher's gear for Little League
customer_reviews.text: Very good catcher's gear. The chest protector is 13 inches, well padded. The Helmet is a Hockey style mask. The shin protectors are well padded and are very easy to put on and take off. We put the Mizuno Knee Savers on the shin guards. The shoulder pads, side protectors and groin protector are removable.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Edralin

customer_reviews.title: He says it is very light weight and comfortable. Fits good with room to grow
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old son loves this gear. He says it is very light weight and comfortable. Fits good with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: scott cramer

customer_reviews.title: More protective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this set for my son's first year of kid pitch. I didn't want to put him in the position of having to share any equipment given the events of the past year. The quality is so much better than the equipment that the league provides. I feel real confident that he is much safer behind the plate. From a size standpoint, he just turned 9 and is very big for his age. The equipment fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice stuff, except helmet liner
customer_reviews.text: This is nicer quality stuff and he gets tons of compliments on it. The helmet seems to be the weak point, after one season the liner is coming out, probably from being hot and sweaty all the time. You will also need to purchase a chin guard. I would have given it five stars if it wasn’t for the helmet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great set! It fits my 11 year old daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great set! It fits my 11 year old daughter perfectly and it's a sharp looking set. The straps on the shin guards are ridiculously long. We will have to tape up the excess, but I can't imagine anyone needing straps that long.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl U.

customer_reviews.title: Quality equipment
customer_reviews.text: You have heard the term good, better, best? Mizuno is worth it, pay a little more and get the best. All the pieces are better then what my son used this past season. The chest protector is lighter that what my son used in the past and it is stronger, thicker and safer at the same time. My son is 9 years old and is slightly taller than his classmates. Fits him very well.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Cook

customer_reviews.title: Great gear
customer_reviews.text: Really high quality gear. I expected it to be good, but is really great. Fits my 9 year old just fine. Has extra layers of protection from standard sets. I would highly recommend even at a price higher than other sets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: 9 year old big boy 100 pound fits good and my son loves it he is having fun and it is very protective and durable.
customer_reviews.author: PETER CERDA

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was not able to use the Little League's gear because it was too large. This fit perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great catchers gear
customer_reviews.text: Great catchers gear! I bought for my 9 yr old boy. Nice looking and fits well. Only thing I forgot was you need to buy Knee savers and a throat guard seperate. Which is usually a given that a lot of catchers want in addition to their gear. Son loves it... a lot of room to grow in an still fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dene Dee

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his new gear.
customer_reviews.text: Received our gear 4/17/2017 and my son had a game that night. He was super excited, it fits well and he says it very comfortable. I love the look and seems to have great protection. I definitely would recommend this product. Little more expensive but seems worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: My catcher loves them, not one complaint or issue. He's a small-side 11 and these will work for a couple years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Great catching gear
customer_reviews.text: This gear is great, easy on easy off. The helmet has great vision.
customer_reviews.author: James VanWinkle

customer_reviews.title: youth catcher
customer_reviews.text: This gear has been fantastic. My son is 10 and it fits him great now but still allows room for growth. All of the kids think it looks really tough as well. He has a couple of friends that are back up catchers that wear this gear instead of the league issued gear. It works well and is easy to clean up after a muddy game.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set! Got this for our 12 year old, fits great with room to grow.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Shipping is my only complaint.
customer_reviews.text: the equipment is great. My grandson loves it. My only problem is that I bought it on Friiday, paid extra to have it overnighted, and did not receive it until Monday. irst time Amazon ever let me down.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi2020

customer_reviews.title: fantastic set!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone wants to borrow from my grandson, Well made, fantastic set !
customer_reviews.author: Libby

customer_reviews.title: 9yr old daughter
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 9yr old daughter who is playing 10u. At first I was worried she may have to wait a year to wear the chest protector because it looks big, but it has worked out great. This set is hands down the best set I've seen. Our team also uses the U.A. set and this is better quality and protection. The helmet is so light compared to others and looks awsome. (Photo is 3yr old modeling helmet)
customer_reviews.author: J.D.

customer_reviews.title: Good gear for kids
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 year-old son and he loved it but so did the rest of his team. This became our team set and everybody refused to catch in anything else. Lightweight and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R

customer_reviews.title: Great catchers set
customer_reviews.text: This catchers set is great. I bought it for my son who is 9, his team catchers set was way to big and did not provide a lot of protection but this one provides a lot of protection and now all of the kids that play catcher use it.
customer_reviews.author: MARC2K6

customer_reviews.title: Best you can get
customer_reviews.text: High end set of gear and on the big side for my 10 year old. He should get years of use out of it, very well made
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Good set, very happy
customer_reviews.text: Good set, very happy. My son is an average sized 10 year old and this set is a little big on him but it will be nice for him to use multiple years. Good protection and durability. Definitely a better set than what's out there in price comparison but it is a little heavy on the helmet and leg protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent fit for thin to average kids 9 -12. this is quality gear for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Roland W. Tollett

customer_reviews.title: Best catchers gear on the market
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for high-quality catchers gear then this is the set you want. From the moment you take it out of the package, you can tell that every piece is well made and well thought out. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: C. Perry

customer_reviews.title: He is 8 and the gear fit him great and we should get a few seasons out of ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this gear, he is not afraid getting behind the plate. He is 8 and the gear fit him great and we should get a few seasons out of it. The bag it came with works great I fit everything in there nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R.

customer_reviews.title: Good but big
customer_reviews.text: Quality: Excellent. Easily the nicest catching gear our team has had in over 9 seasons. When they say that it's like MLB gear I don't doubt it. There were so many thoughtful design touches that it was clear someone had spent a lot of time thinking about how catchers use their gear. One big grip, the age range on the side of the box is for 8-11. I would say closer to 10-13. It was too big for all but one of my kids (age 8-11). Wish this would have been around 20 years ago when I played. :)
customer_reviews.author: MonkezUncle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits well and works well for catching. Feel catcher will be safe during baseball season.
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixKitty2Grams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, birthday gift for my son and he was so happy. Very good looking set.
customer_reviews.author: Gin

customer_reviews.title: The best catchers gear out there
customer_reviews.text: The best catchers gear out there. I bought this for my 10yr old son and couldn't be happier with the quality. Highly recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: damien bennett

customer_reviews.title: He loves it and it fits perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son puts this on ALL THE TIME! He loves it and it fits perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia G.

customer_reviews.title: great product. Fully met expectations we had as being ...
customer_reviews.text: Fast service, great product. Fully met expectations we had as being the best you can buy!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lapinskes

customer_reviews.title: ... did not expect the quality i got these are great and the kid loves
customer_reviews.text: for the price i did not expect the quality i got these are great and the kid loves them
customer_reviews.author: bansheeswift55

customer_reviews.title: Questionable youth size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews. I really wanted to like this product. It is definitely well made; however, I am not sure if the sizing is correct. This is marked for youth age 9-12, but it runs really big. Shin guard is 14.5' while other youth brands are in the range of 12' - 13'. Chest protector is 14', again most are in the 13'. The helmet looks nice, but my daughter complained of narrow field of view compare to Eastons helmet. Overall, I would not pick this product if your child is 9-10.
customer_reviews.author: I. Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great catchers set!
customer_reviews.text: Sons been using it daily for about 2 weeks, loves it! 10 years old 100 pounds. Great quality! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best youth gear
customer_reviews.text: Read about a dozen reviews, and everyone rated Mizuno Samauri as #1 or #2. My son needed new gear due to a faulty snap on his Easton catchers helmet, so I bit the bullet. He played a full tournament this weekend and is in love with his new gear. According to him the helmet is more comfortable and easy to put on. Chest protector has great padding. The leg guards have more of the protective fabric "wings" on the sides than other brands. Definitely gets two thumbs up from him...and me!
customer_reviews.author: mustangnut

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The gear is great and the quality and the protection is great. My 11yr old son loved it and it fit him perfect. Its a great upgrade from his first catchers gear.
customer_reviews.author: A. Negron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my son love it. Comes with a extra knew guard
customer_reviews.author: varsha  thakre

customer_reviews.title: Pro quality
customer_reviews.text: It's the only youth gear that really does a good job protecting the catcher. My 9 year old kid is fearless with it and blocks everything
customer_reviews.author: Robert R

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this set is great! it's lightweight and comfortable. easy to adjust and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase! It is just what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: b_oliveros

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 4 yrs running and only changed the helmet. Travel ball approved
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy K. Walton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very well crafted product, but heavy and built for larger kids.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Pierson

customer_reviews.title: Great Gear for My Intermediate Player
customer_reviews.text: This Mizuno package was top-notch and fit the bill for my 11-year-old travelballer. Been very pleased so far with the quality of the gear and the protection provided behind the plate. Only negative is that the package is advertised as coming with a bag. The "free bag" does not come close to being large enough for that purpose. Buy a catcher's gear bag too. You will need it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: catchers gear
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for my 10 year old. Looks good too. Very comfortable and adjustable to any degree. Nice bag but not a true catchers bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brian V.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Catcher's Gear
customer_reviews.text: This is top-notch catcher's gear. The materials are rugged, and the protection is first rate. Once you break it in, it should be very comfortable (or at least as comfortable as catcher's gear can be).
customer_reviews.author: DE area resident

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great service, good quality catchers gear, the player loved it. A great set for a travel team. Once you have a set you can always switch out the pieces as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Migliori

customer_reviews.title: May cost a little more but the quality and safety outweigh the price!
customer_reviews.text: This set is awesome. I looked around at dozens of other sets online and in stores and set always got great reviews. I decided to try it out. It is a little higher priced than other sets I found but safety and quality take precedent. This set fits all 4 boys (9-10 yr olds) that switch off catching perfectly. The shin guards offer more protection than cheaper sets and they are very easy to put on and take off. The facemask and helmet offer a little more protection in the chin/neck area which is comforting. The boys have taken many balls to the chestguand and shinguards and have felt no discomfort.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A Anglin

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old loves this equipment.
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Mizuno Catcher's equipment. We haven't been through a whole season with it yet, but after a few weeks use it has proven itself to be top shelf. My son likes the look and fit. He looks great in it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D. Holland

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It fits well and has a lot of protection. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jarema

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I feel very comfortable having my son protected by this gear. The helmet is very padded and still comfortable. The shin pads scratch deeply and easily (easier than other brands we've used) but otherwise a great set. If you're hesitating to spend a few extra bucks on this set- I urge you to do it. I've seen a lot of brands on the field and I'd still choose this again & again.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Anthropic

customer_reviews.title: Comfiest catchers gear in the world!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfy catchers gear I have ever worn in my life. Definitely recommended for catchers that go a long time catching.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Sacchetti

customer_reviews.title: Most of his team uses his gear and all like it. The helmet and gear do not fit ...
customer_reviews.text: My son ordered the youth size. He said it fits really well. Most of his team uses his gear and all like it. The helmet and gear do not fit into the bag it comes with though.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Cichosz

product_meta.title: Mizuno Youth Samurai Box Set (Black/Grey)
product_meta.description: The Mizuno Youth Samurai Box Set contains everything your child needs to begin catching-helmet, shin guards, chest protector, and gear bag are included in this box set. (Black/Grey only, mitt not included).
feature_bullets: Does not include mitt and ball.Samurai Youth Helmet:3 layer EVA foam padding

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
